projects.title: Self-Sovereign Identity and Verifiable Data
projects.about: Used Self-Sovereign Identity and Verifiable data to automate the process of applying for unemployment benefits.

projects.title: Detecting Ballan Wrasse
projects.about: Using traditional computer vision techinques and machine learning to detect ballan wrasse in different underwater enivronments.

projects.title: Madshus ski database
projects.about: Created a Madshus ski database using PhP and mySQL, and making an API to interact with it.

projects.title: 2D Action Platformer
projects.about: Created a 2D action platforming game using Unity and C#.

projects.title: Twitch-Discord-API
projects.about: A discord bot that can interact with a Twitch API.

projects.title: MetIma
projects.about: A desktop program written in Java. It was used for extracting metadata from images.
